body.ab: <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C28"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0132__main__3"/>We had resolved not to go to London <lb n="c57-0132__main__4"/>but <mod sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24503"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0132__main__d4e24505">to go</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24508"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24508"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24514"/>to <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24514"/> <mdel>a</mdel> <mod eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24503"/> cross the country to Portsmouth <lb n="c57-0132__main__5"/>and <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0132__main__d4e24522">from</del> thence to embark to Havre. I <lb n="c57-0132__main__6"/>preferred this <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0132__main__d4e24528">pan</del> plan principally because <lb n="c57-0132__main__7"/>I dreaded to see again those places in which <lb n="c57-0132__main__8"/>I had enjoyed a few moments of <w ana="start"/>tranquilli<lb n="c57-0132__main__9"/>ty<w ana="end"/> with my beloved Cl <mod sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24542"/> <mdel>ai</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24546"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24546"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24552"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24552"/><mod eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24542"/> rval – And I thought <lb n="c57-0132__main__10"/>with horror of seeing those men whom <lb n="c57-0132__main__11"/>we had been accustomed to visit together <lb n="c57-0132__main__12"/>and who, doubtless, would make enquiries <lb n="c57-0132__main__13"/>concerning an event the very remembrance <lb n="c57-0132__main__14"/>of which ma <mod sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24567"/> <mdel>k</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24571"/>d <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24571"/><mod eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24567"/> e me again feel what I <lb n="c57-0132__main__15"/>endured when I gazed on his lifeless form. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0132__main__16"/>As for my father; his desires & <w ana="start"/>exer<lb n="c57-0132__main__17"/>tions<w ana="end"/> were bounded to the again seeing <lb n="c57-0132__main__18"/>me <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0132__main__d4e24590">res</del> restored to health and peace of <lb n="c57-0132__main__19"/>mind. His tenderness & attentions were <lb n="c57-0132__main__20"/>unremitt <mod sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24597"/> <mdel>ed</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24601"/>ing <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24601"/><mod eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24597"/> , my grief and gloom was <w ana="start"/>o <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0132__main__d4e24608"/>bs <sga-add eID="c57-0132__main__d4e24608"/>ti <lb n="c57-0132__main__21"/>nate<w ana="end"/> but he would not despair.<w ana="start"/>Some<lb n="c57-0132__main__22"/>times<w ana="end"/> he thought that I felt deeply <lb n="c57-0132__main__23"/>the degradation of being obliged to answer <lb n="c57-0132__main__24"/>a charge of murderand he endeavoured <lb n="c57-0132__main__25"/>to prove to me the futility of pride. <lb n="c57-0132__main__26"/>Alas!my father,said I, howlittle do you <lb n="c57-0132__main__27"/>know me:human beings, their feelings <lb n="c57-0132__main__28"/>and passionswould indeed be degraded<lb n="c57-0132__main__29"/>if such a wretch as I felt pride. Justine<lb n="c57-0132__main__30"/>poor unhappy Justinewas as innocent <lb n="c57-0132__main__31"/>as Iand she suffered the same charge,<lb n="c57-0132__main__32"/>she died for it –And I am the cause <lb n="c57-0132__main__33"/>of this – Imurdered her. William <lb n="c57-0133__main__1"/>Justine& Henry, theyall died by my hand<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0133__main__2"/>My father had oftenduring my <lb n="c57-0133__main__3"/>late confinementheard me make the <lb n="c57-0133__main__4"/>same Assertion <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0133.01"/>& his astonishment <lb n="c57-0133__main__5"/>was extreme <delSpan anchor="c57-0133.01"/>.When <mod sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24683"/> <mdel>he</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24687"/>I <sga-add eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24687"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24690">heard me</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24693"/>thus <sga-add eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24693"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24696">thus</del> <mod eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24683"/> ac <lb n="c57-0133__main__6"/>accuse <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24703"/>d <sga-add eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24703"/>myself, he sometimes seemed to desire<lb n="c57-0133__main__7"/>an explanation& at others he appeared <lb n="c57-0133__main__8"/>to consider it as caused by delirium &<lb n="c57-0133__main__9"/>that <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24716">some idea</del>during my illnesssome <lb n="c57-0133__main__10"/>idea of this kind had presented itself <lb n="c57-0133__main__11"/>to my imagination <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24723">t</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24726">an</del>the <w ana="start"/>remembe<lb n="c57-0133__main__12"/>rance<w ana="end"/>of which I preserved in my <w ana="start"/>conva<lb n="c57-0133__main__13"/>lescence<w ana="end"/>. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24742">I</del>avoided explanation; I<w ana="start"/>main<lb n="c57-0133__main__14"/>tained<w ana="end"/> a continual silence concerning <lb n="c57-0133__main__15"/>the wretch I had created. Ihad a feeling<lb n="c57-0133__main__16"/>that I should be supposed madand this <lb n="c57-0133__main__17"/>for ever chained my tonguewhen I <lb n="c57-0133__main__18"/>would have given the whole world to <lb n="c57-0133__main__19"/>have confided the fatal secret. <w ana="start"/>Up<lb n="c57-0133__main__20"/>on<w ana="end"/> th <mod sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24769"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24773"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24773"/><mod eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24769"/> s <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24778"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24778"/>occasion <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0133__main__d4e24781"/>s <sga-add eID="c57-0133__main__d4e24781"/> my father saidwith <lb n="c57-0133__main__21"/>an expression of unbounded wonder <lb n="c57-0133__main__22"/>What do you mean, Victor, are you mad?<lb n="c57-0133__main__23"/>My dear son, I entreat you notto make <lb n="c57-0133__main__24"/>so strangean assertion again.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0133__main__25"/>Iam not mad,I cried energetically, <lb n="c57-0133__main__26"/>thesun & the heavenswho have <w ana="start"/>view<lb n="c57-0133__main__27"/>ed<w ana="end"/> my operationscan bear witness of <lb n="c57-0133__main__28"/>my truth. I wasthe assassin of those <lb n="c57-0133__main__29"/>most innocent victims —they died by my <lb n="c57-0133__main__30"/>machinations. A thousand times would <lb n="c57-0133__main__31"/>I <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24814">rather</del> have shed my own blood<lb n="c57-0133__main__32"/>drop <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0133__main__d4e24820">d</del> by dropto have saved their lives:<lb n="c57-0133__main__33"/>But I could not, my father, indeed I <lb n="c57-0134__main__1"/>could not sacrifice the whole human race. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0134__main__2"/>The conclusion of this speech persuadedmy <lb n="c57-0134__main__3"/>father that my ideas were deranged –and <mod sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24843"/> <mdel>he</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24847"/>by<sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24847"/><mod eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24843"/><w ana="start"/>instant<lb n="c57-0134__main__4"/>ly<w ana="end"/> chang <mod sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24858"/> <mdel>ed</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24862"/>ing <sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24862"/><mod eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24858"/>the subject of our conversation <mod sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24866"/> <mdel>&</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24870"/>he<sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24870"/><mod eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24866"/><lb n="c57-0134__main__5"/>endeavoured to alter the course of my thoughts. <lb n="c57-0134__main__6"/>He wished as much as possible to obliterate the <lb n="c57-0134__main__7"/>memory of the scenes in Irelandand never <lb n="c57-0134__main__8"/>again alluded to themor suffered me to speak <lb n="c57-0134__main__9"/>of my misfortunes. As time passed away I became <lb n="c57-0134__main__10"/>more calm;misery had her dwelling in my <lb n="c57-0134__main__11"/>heartbut I no longer talked in the <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24890"/>same <sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24890"/>incoherent <lb n="c57-0134__main__12"/>manner <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24895">I before did</del> of my own crimes; <w ana="start"/>suffi<lb n="c57-0134__main__13"/>cient<w ana="end"/> for me was the consciousness of them. <lb n="c57-0134__main__14"/>By the utmost self violenceI curbed the <lb n="c57-0134__main__15"/>imperious voice of wretchednesswhich <lb n="c57-0134__main__16"/>desired sometimesto declare itself to the <lb n="c57-0134__main__17"/>whole world,& my manners were calmer <lb n="c57-0134__main__18"/>& more composed than they had ever been <lb n="c57-0134__main__19"/>since myjourney to the Sea of Ice. Even <lb n="c57-0134__main__20"/>my father who watched me as the bird <lb n="c57-0134__main__21"/>does its <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24922">n</del> nestling was deceived and thought <lb n="c57-0134__main__22"/>that the black melancholy which had <lb n="c57-0134__main__23"/>oppressed me was quitting me for ever <lb n="c57-0134__main__24"/>and that my native country & the society <lb n="c57-0134__main__25"/>of my friends would entirely restore me to <lb n="c57-0134__main__26"/>my former health & vivacity.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0134__main__27"/>We arrived at Havre on the 8 <shi rend="underline"></shi> <lb n="c57-0134__main__28"/>of <mod sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24949"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24951">February</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24954"/>May <sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24954"/><mod eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24949"/>& instantly proceededto Paris <lb n="c57-0134__main__29"/>where my father had some business <lb n="c57-0134__main__30"/>which detained <mod sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24962"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24964"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24964"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e24970"/>us <sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24970"/><mod eID="c57-0134__main__d4e24962"/>a few weeks. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24974">I I rermain</del> <lb n="c57-0134__main__31"/> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24980">ed</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24983">with</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e24986">him.</del> In this cityI received the <lb n="c57-0134__main__32"/>following letter from Elizabeth:
